name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Security Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications, now pivoting into cybersecurity engineering. Proficient in **security architecture**, **cloud security**, and **information security frameworks**, with a strong command of **scripting languages** and **Linux** for automating security processes. Skilled in **vulnerability scanning tools** and **penetration testing**, ensuring robust system defenses and compliance with industry standards.
Experienced in **risk management** and **incident response**, with proven problem-solving abilities that enhance team collaboration and communication skills. Additionally, leveraging a solid foundation in full-stack development, including expertise in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, and **Django** to integrate security best practices into the software development lifecycle. Well-versed in cloud deployments on **AWS** and **Azure**, and familiar with **DevSecOps** methodologies to foster secure, scalable solutions.
